# Visual Studio Code
 
Workspace Commands       | 
-------------------------|-----
**Command Palette**      | ctrl shift p

-------------------------|-----
**Outdent line**         | ctrl '

**Move line up or down** | alt &uarr; / alt &darr;
**Copy line up or down** | alt shift &uarr; / alt shift &darr;
